message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $8,000. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective on the price. While $8,000 is too low, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we agree on $12,000?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $12,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500. Would you be willing to consider that price?
